MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void XsltCopyOf(class System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator navigator) cil managed

param.name: navigator
param.span: 对象。

span.span: object.

summary.span: 根据以下 XSLT 规则按值向输出复制节点：从不保留标识；如果该项为 RTF，则复制时保留序列化提示；如果该项为根节点，则复制根的子级。

span.span: Copies a node by value to output according to the following Xslt rules: identity is never preserved, if the item is an Rtf, preserve serialization hints when copying, and if the item is a root node, copy the children of the root.
